DocAttribute.Name: ParentProfile
DocAttribute.Documentation: The parent profile provides the origin of the transformation.

DocAttribute.Name: Operator
DocAttribute.Documentation: Transformation operator applied to the parent profile.

DocAttribute.Name: Label
DocAttribute.Documentation: The name by which the transformation may be referred to. The actual meaning of the name has to be defined in the context of applications.

DocWhereRule.Name: InvariantProfileType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The profile type of the derived profile shall be the same as the type of the parent profile, i.e. both shall be either AREA or CURVE.
